aas_core.aas3_0.types.model

Interface IDataSpecificationIec61360

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClass, IDataSpecificationContent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSpecificationIec61360, EnhancedDataSpecificationIec61360

    public interface IDataSpecificationIec61360
extends IDataSpecificationContent
    Content of data specification template for concept descriptions for properties, values and value lists conformant to IEC 61360.

    IEC61360 requires also a globally unique identifier for a concept description. This ID is not part of the data specification template. Instead the ConceptDescription.getId() as inherited via IIdentifiable is used. Same holds for administrative information like the version and revision.

    ConceptDescription.getIdShort() and getShortName() are very similar. However, in this case the decision was to add getShortName() explicitly to the data specification. Same holds for ConceptDescription.getDisplayName() and getPreferredName(). Same holds for ConceptDescription.getDescription() and getDefinition().

    Constraints:

    • Constraint AASc-3a-010: If getValue() is not empty then getValueList() shall be empty and vice versa.

      It is also possible that both getValue() and getValueList() are empty. This is the case for concept descriptions that define the semantics of a property but do not have an enumeration (getValueList()) as data type.

      Although it is possible to define a ConceptDescription for a :attr:Â´value_list`, it is not possible to reuse this getValueList(). It is only possible to directly add a getValueList() as data type to a specific semantic definition of a property.

    • Constraint AASc-3a-009: If getDataType() one of: DataTypeIec61360.INTEGER_MEASURE, DataTypeIec61360.REAL_MEASURE, DataTypeIec61360.RATIONAL_MEASURE, DataTypeIec61360.INTEGER_CURRENCY, DataTypeIec61360.REAL_CURRENCY, then getUnit() or getUnitId() shall be defined.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferredName

        List<ILangStringPreferredNameTypeIec61360> getPreferredName()
        Preferred name

        It is advised to keep the length of the name limited to 35 characters.

        Constraints:

        • Constraint AASc-3a-002: getPreferredName() shall be provided at least in English.

        Optional<IReference> getUnitId()
        Unique unit id

        getUnit() and getUnitId() need to be consistent if both attributes are set
